nodes.text: The Devonian was an assault shuttle used in the First Battle of Borleias. Judder Page was on the ship, which was saved from TIE interceptors by Rogue Squadron X-wings under Corran Horn.
It was also part of the New Republic fleet during the Liberation of Coruscant. Along with the Ryloth, the ship was dispatched by Admiral Ackbar to rescue any survivors on a crippled Golan III.
